strow.stentry: Mandatory property. The possible values are Sum, Max and Weighted Mean. Default is Sum.
Property available only if the item is a computed column. Default value proposed by the designer can be changed to a name that has a business meaning.
This read-only property differentiates a computed column from a column created by an attribute drop.
Property available only if the item is an additional column. It is a Boolean which defines whether to display the aggregate for the whole column.
An attribute of the dataset used as the weight to compute the weighted mean. This property is editable only when the Aggregation Type is Weighted Mean; otherwise it is undefined.

section.title: Description
section.p: A description of the item can be provided in this section.

This property allows changing the vertical alignment of the item.
You can use this property to select a pattern for the item rendering.

section.title: Translation
section.p: A translation can be defined for the tooltip only (label displayed when the mouse is over the cell).

strow.stentry: This property defines if the item is enabled or not. If Conditional is chosen, a condition must be entered in the Enabled is based on property.
If the Enabled property is set to Conditional, this property contains the condition.

section.title: Event
section.p: Events linked to this item can be created in this section.
